title: The Passing of King George VI
brief_description: Thousands pay homage to the memory of their beloved King George VI at Westminster Abbey. Also includes footage of funeral procession to historic Windsor, the last resting place.
description: Thousands pay homage to the memory of their beloved King George VI at Westminster Abbey. Also includes footage of funeral procession to historic Windsor, the last resting place.
